text: Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, gu nde ndɨkndɨgir kurkurar zav, ŋka Aporos gum, gu ŋka wani zɨni zitav kha buni suaŋgi. Nde ŋka ndɨkndɨgɨp, nde Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ ki gap suaŋgi tɨvi guari, nde nta zɨn ŋgɨri. Nde mba buni khiiŋ thivɨ thari. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde rɨɨŋrɨɨŋv guma the zɨ ndi vun fɨv, the zɨ mbevɨ thari.
